title: Trainspotting
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Ah pass ma auld Montgomery Street gaff, then the former junk zone of Albert Street, now sandblasted and tarted up. A polis car frantically lets rip on the siren as it hurtles doon the Walk.

title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: No, it has not. Because one thing ah mind ay clearly is a certain address in Albert Street, and the seven digits ay a phone number gied tae us by Seeker. Ah move across tae Hazel n pit my airm around her slender waist.

title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: 524 same desolate skag reek of Albert Street. — What are we daein here?
